QuestData.Title: The Red Axe
QuestData.Description:
Broxigar the Red is cornered on the bridge. I am not sure he would ever admit that he needs our help, but I feel it only proper to lend him our aid.
If you wish to assist our ally, I would be humbled to accompany you in this endeavor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Close the Unstable Portals and make your way to Broxigar the Red.
QuestData.RewardText: A wise warrior welcomes all allies. You fight with the strength of an orc.
